attributes.action: deal with the web site that edits it before it is sent
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The 1698 Memorandum of an Association of Free peoples King William of Orange the new chairman. 
As Home Secretary why do you not uphold your own OFFICE to which your swore on Oath so to do?
Why do you allow Gordon Brown to breach his custodianship of the Prorogative he holds. Your policies have made me an abused man and I cannot win the person with the gun!

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
